content:
In the context of my question I saw related posts (did not find them before searching "copy emails"). Going offline before mass copy seems a good hint, I will try.

Still remaining as a question: is there a modal dialog option for copying resp. a final status feedback (like "1250 emails copied" or "copy process failed due to..."
creator: co-base

content: I solved the problem by deleting a second account in Thunderbird. Appearantly that account disrupted my main account
creator: m.schilperoort

content: Voor problemen met verzenden kunt u dit artikel raadplegen: https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/kan-geen-berichten-verzenden. De toepasselijke gegevens van Telenet kunt u hier terug vinden: https://www2.telenet.be/residential/nl/klantenservice/internet/e-mail/e-mail-instellen.html.
creator: Mozilla-assistent

content: If your folders consist of just inbox, sent, draft, trash, a switch from IMAP to POP will put future messages on PC and no further action would be needed, other than copying existing sent folder to PC. If you want to just transfer some messages to PC, you could highlight and copy selected messages to a Local Folders folder, and then delete those highlighted messages from the server.
creator: davidsk
